De cauterizacio de extrophulos.	De cauterizacio de extrophulos" translates to "Of cauterization of extrophulos
Quan extrophulos so de flecma e de humors fregas e no so hobedientz a digistio per medicinas e tu voys la digistio de aquelas leugerament, lahoras tu igneys le cauteri conquau la forma del qual es aquesta seguen, havent dos extremitatz hubertas per que yesca le fum deves le cauteri per l’autra extremitat, e pausa aquel ignit sobre aquel apostema una veguada, e autre si indigeyses de aquel, entro que pervengua al preon del apostema.	When extrophulos are of flexion and of cold humors and not obeying the digestive tract by medicines, and you see the digestive tract showing slight signs, then you ignite the cauterization with the form that this follows, having two ends with which you can scrape the smoke from the other end, and pause the ignition over the wound one vein, and another if you prescribe, until it reaches the opening of the wound.
E si l’apostema es pauca, lahoras pausa le cauteri segon la quantitat del apostema, e aprop leyssa le per tres jorns e pausa sobre lu coto enfus en boder entro que sia remaugut aquo que·l foc ha comburit.	If the gout is small, you should stop the cauterization according to the amount of gout, and then press on the area for three hours and leave it there, as it may be useful to relieve the pain caused by the fire.
E aprop cura aquel am enguent e tentas e draps entro que sia sanat.	And take care of that wound and try to dry it within what is healthy.
E la forma de la cannula o deu cauteri a tal es comveyter.	And the form of the needle or cauterization is as follows.
Capitol .xxiii.	Chapter 23.
De cauterizacio de rauquiera de votz e de constriccio de ale.	Of cauterization of inflammation of the throat and constriction of the neck.
Quan las humiditatz veno sobre le quanal del pulmo, e majorment quan aquo es am fregiditat de compleccio, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia evacuat al comensament am medicinas laxativas, e aprop cauteriza aquel deves la razit del golayro en le loc depremegut.	When cold humors invade the bronchus, and more so when there is overall frigidity, you should cover that part of the body with something warm, and then cauterize it at the point of the groin in the area that is affected.
E guarda te que no pervenguas am le cauteri al golayro ni no comburas de la codena de lu sino un pauc.	And be careful not to get the cauterization on the groin or burn yourself from the waistbone of the body, but only a little.
E cauteriza aquel am autra cauteri deves la junctura del col en le derier espondil de lu.	And you should cauterize that part with another cauterization at the joint of the knee in the upper part of the leg.
E·l cauteri de lu sia clavilh sego la maniera precedent.	And the cautery of this should be made in the manner previously described.
E aprop cura aquel am aquo que es precedit entro que sia sanat.	And similarly, take care of that gout which is previously entered, if it is cured.
Capitol .xxiiii.	Capitol Chapter 24.
De cauterizacio de malautia del pulmo e de tos.	Of cauterization of the lung disease and cough.
Quan tos e malautia de pulmo so de humiditatz fregas e le malaute no ha febre ni tisic e es malautia antiqua, lahoras cauterisa aquel am dos cauteris sobre la furcula en les locz depremegutz leontz e buoytz; e am autra cauteri en le mieg loc del pietz entre dos mamillos; e sia le cauteri clavilh segon la forma precedent.	When the cough and lung disease are caused by cold humors and the patient does not have fever or chills and it is an old cough, then cauterize that part with two points on the shoulder in the areas where the bones are loose and swollen; and also cauterize at the mouth's side between two milks; and let the cauterization be done by a clavilh according to the previous form.
E si vols, sia la tua cauterizacio punctan am le cauteri que es apelat puncta, la forma del qual precedeys en la ponctacio de dolor de aurelhas.	And if you want, your cauterization is made with points at the cauterizations called points, in the form that precedes in the relief of ear pain.

De cauterizacio de titillic que es le cap del ajutori.	From the cauterization of the tip that is the head of the assistant.

Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter 26.
De cauterizacio del stomac.	Of cauterization of the stomach.
Quan veno en l’estomac freg e motas humiditatz entro que aquel extrazo de la sua compleccio e so multiplicatz raumases a lu, e si tu continuas las manieyras de curacio e no confereyso, lahoras cove que le malaute sia sobre le sieu dos ressupinat, e extenda las suas mas e las suas coysas, e aprop cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris: an un cauteri dejos le pietz per la quantitat d’un dit am cauteri clavilh, e am dos cauteris dejos del dos costatz del cauteri, entro que vengua la figura de cauteri triangulada; e elonga entre els que no sian ajustatz que faran poyredura.	When pain occurs in the stomach and moisture enters that part of the body, and if you continue the treatment and do not confirm, then it is possible that the thigh is over the seat of pain, and extend your hands and feet and make three cuts on the cauterization point as follows: one cut of the size of a certain cauterization point, and two cuts on the two sides of the cauterization point, until the figure of the triangular cauterization is formed; and stretch those that are not adjusted to make a suture.
E si la profunditat del cauteri la quantitat de les dos terses de la grocesa de la codena.	If the depth of the cauterization is the quantity of the two thirds of the length of the coccyx.
E sia la figura del cauteri segon aquesta forma ses addicio, E si vols, cauteriza am gran cauteri en le mieg loc del estomac segon aquesta forma; et aquest sia un cauteri segon la forma de cercle segon aquesta forma:	And if the figure of the cauterization is this form, and if you want, cauterize with a large cauterization in the middle of the stomach according to this form; and this is a cauterization according to the form of a circle according to this form:
E sia cauterizat l’estomac punctan ad aquel que de aquest cauteri es spaventat: e es que tu senhes sobre l’estomac punt segon la quantitat que voles am tenta, e aprop cauteriza aquel am cauteri en les puntz; e aprop cura aquel am la curacio qu’es precedita entro que sia sanat.	And if the stomach is cauterized at the point that is feared by this cauterization: and it is that you are over the stomach with points according to the quantity you want, and then cauterize that point in the cauterization; and then cure that part of the cure that was previously treated until it is healthy.
Capitol .xxvii.	Chapter 27.
De cauterizacio del fietge fret.	Of cauterization of the gout of the foot.
Quan endeve en le fietge dolor per fregiditat o per humiditat o per grossa ventositat entro que de la sieua normal compleccio sia getat per egressio superflua, e es curat le malaute am aquo que havem dit e no comfereys, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sua cervitz, e senhes am tenta tres cauteris segon aquesta forma et aquesta quantitat meteyssa sobre le fietge dejos dels ipocondres, la hon perve le decubit de home.	When the pain in the foot increases due to coldness or wetness or large ejection, and the coccyx is getting out of its normal position and is being pushed out by excessive excretion, and this coccyx is laid over the cervix, and you are afraid to do three cauterizations according to this form and this quantity on the foot below the hip bones, the doctor will lie down in the decubitus of home.
E sia l’espazi le qual es entre quascun cauteri segon la grossetut del dit, e sia le cauteri segon la longitut del cors dreyta.	When the space is equal to the size of the largest part of the body that corresponds to the cauterization, and the cauterization is made along the length of the body.
E no compremas la tua am le cauteri mot.	If you do not understand your own cauterization method.
E si la quantitat de aquo que es adhurit la quantitat de la maytat de la specitut de la codena, e no y sia pus ajustat; e si le malaute stant sobre les pes de lu; e si no es estant, lahoras sia jassent, le qual ja ha extendudas las suas coysas, e eleve les sieus brasses.	If the amount of water that is applied is equal to the amount of the specific part of the intestine, and it is not adjusted; and if the thigh is on the feet of the patient; and if it is not, then the hand should be gently held, which has already extended its fingers, and raise the patient's knees.
E es aquesta la forma del cauteri:	And is this the form of the cauterization:
E a tu es possible que cauterizes aquestz cauteris am cauteri cutellar, quan es am tu subtilitat e prudencia en l’art.	And can you possibly cauterize these with a cauterization iron, when you have skill and prudence in the art?
E guarda te que trop no procesiscas en la cauterizacio, e sia adhurida la specitut de tota la codena per que sia adhurit tot le cors e pervengua entro als budels, quar la codena aqui es subtil; e sapias aquo.	And be careful not to process too much in the cauterization, and apply the specific part of the entire intestine throughout the body, so that the entire intestine is inside the feet, where the thigh is subtle; and you know this.
Capitol .xxviii.	Chapter 28.
De perforacio de apostema del fietge am cauteri.	Of perforation of the wound by the cauterization of the patient.
Quan endeve excitura o apostema en le fietge e voles saber si aquel apostema es en le carn del fietge o en la tunica de lu, lahoras si es en la carn del fietge, le malaute atrobo gravitat e dolor ses acuitat.	When there is pain or inflammation in the foot and one wants to know if the inflammation is in the flesh or in the skin, if it is in the flesh, the leg becomes heavy and painful at its point of origin.
E si es en la tunica del fietge, am la dolor es acuitat gran e vezes que ja afatiguatz les metges la cura de lu.	And if it is in the skin of the foot, then the pain is sharp and often exhausts the doctors with their treatment of him.
Donc cove que·l malaute sia enversat sobre la sieua cervit; e aprop senha le loc de l’apostema am tenta; e aprop igneys le cauteri le quel es asemblat a rag, la forma del qual a precedit en l’autra pagina.	Therefore, the leg should be covered over the shoulder blade; and clearly mark the location of the inflammation that has been caused; and carefully choose the cauterization that is most suitable for the form that is prescribed in the next page.
E cauteriza am aquel i cauteri entro que tota la codena sia comborida, entro que pervengua al ciphac, entro qu’en yesca sania.	And cauterize it and cauterize when the entire chain is burned, when it reaches the hip, when it goes through the skin, when it causes pain.
E aprop cura aquel per curacio dels autres apostemas entro que sia sanat.	And treat that for the cure of the other inflammations when it is healed.
E no cove que de aquesta forma de cauteri use sino aquel del qual le estudi en l’art de medicina es prolonguat, e en las mas del qual motas malautias an conogut; mays aquest am esperiment alcunas veguadas sia ardit sobre aquesta operacio, mays empero leyssa aquela deves nos, e es miels.	And it is not necessary to use this form of cauterization except for the one that is studied in the art of medicine is prolonged, and in those from which many diseases are cured; but this has been experimented on some wounds that were severe about this operation, but less so than the one that we must use, and it is more effective.

De cauterizacio de plauresi.	When joint pain is caused by cold humors, it is called gout by doctors.
Diyssero les antics cauteri de las razitz de aristologia a plauresi frega segon aquesta manieyra esser fazedor, e es aquest que tu prenguas de las razitz de aristologia longa secca una razit pun longua que es trobada, e sia de la grossetut del dit.	When the ancient cauteries of surgery are used for the treatment of flees in this manner, and it is this that you take from the flees of alchemy, long and dry a flee that is found, and it is of the largest kind of the same.
E aprop submergeys aquela en oli e eysen aquela al foc, e aprop cauteriza per un cauteri en aquel loc le qual es entre la continuacio de la furcula am le col; e am dos cauteris petitz dejos guidazi, un pauc declinans a la partida que es dejus la barba, e am dos cauteris en aquo que es declinant entre la quinta costa e la cizena, declinant un pauc a las partidas detras; e am autre cauteri en le mieg loc del pietz; et am autre sobre l’estomac, et am tres cauteris de las partidas detras; et am un cauteri en aquel loc le qual es entre las dos spallas, e am dos cauteris dels dos latz del pietz, dejos le cauteri le qual es entre doas spallas.	1. And you have lowered that part into oil and fire, and have cauterized it with a cautery in that place which is between the bones of the elbow and the collarbone; and two small cauteries were placed further away, one slightly declining towards the side from which the beard was cut off, and two cauteries in that position which are declining between the fifth ribs and the breastbone, declining a little on the sides; and another cauterization in the lower part of the chest; and another over the stomach, and three cauterizations on the sides; and one cauterization in that place which is between the two shoulder blades, and two cauterizations on the two sides of the stomach, further down the cauterization which is between the two shoulder blades.
E no cove que compremas la tua ma am le cauteri, ans sia en le manifest de la codena en obra.	2. And do not worry if you do not understand the use of the cauterization, as it is in the manifestation of the code in work.
E ja diyssero alscus antics que so alscus dels homes les quals uson de cauteri de ferr semblant a ray e igneysso aquel, e meto aquel en aquel loc le qual es entre las costas, entro que pervenguam am aquel ad aquel apostema e sia foragetada sania, ayssi cum havem dit en l’apostema del fietge.	3. And it has already been told to those who use iron cauteries similar to fire and ignite that place, and place it in that position between the ribs, entering that and the aposteme, and remove the sania if it is present there, as they have said in the aposteme of the patient.
Mays en aquesta perforacio am cauteri no es ses temor, quar hu mor tantost ho accideys en le loc fistula a la qual no es sanacio.	In this incision, no fear of cauterization is needed, for it often happens in the place where the fistula was made and is not treated.

De la cauterizacio de la melsa.	Of the cauterization of the mast".
Quan tu curas la malautia de la melsa am aquo que havem dit de la curacio en la divisio e no confereys la tua curacio, lahoras cauteri en lu es segon tres manieras, las quals totas son dreyturieras, de las quals la una es que fassas tres cauteris o quatre linhan segon la longitut de la melsa segon la figura dels cauteris del fietge, la figura dels quals ha precedit.	When you treat the wound of the mast, it is customary to say that the treatment is in division and not your own treatment. Then cauterize on it, there are three ways, all of which are correct, one of which is to make three cauterizations or four lines according to the length of the mast according to the figure of the cauterizations of the patient, the figure of which has preceded.
E sia entre quascun cauteri la grossetut d’un dit o un pauc mes, e la manieyra del cauteri sia la manieyra la qual havem dita en le cauteri del fietge engualment.	And between each cauterization there should be the greatest part of a penny or a few mes, and the hand of the cauterization is the hand that has been said in the cauterization of the patient's engagement.
E no compremas la tua ma am le cauteri; e le malaute sia eves sobre lo sieu dos.	And do not understand your wound, and the wound is easy on the other side.
E es autra manieyra de cauterizar, so es que tu igniscas le cauteri haventz dos vertimentz, la qual causa havem dita en le capitol de dislocacio del muscle, e elava la codena la qual es en le endreyt de la melsa la hon perve le jazer del malaute sinistre.	And there is another hand for cauterization, so you think that you do not know the cauterization because you have two vertiments, which have been said in the capital of dislocation of the muscle, and elavate the codon that is at the end of the mast that passes through the left wound.
E sia la tua elevacio am la qual elevas la codena segon la longuesa del cors, per que sian faytz cauteris segon la latitut del cos.	When you raise your hand above the patient's back to the longest part of the body, so that it is cauterized according to the latitude of the country.
E aprop entromet les dos vernimentz, ignitz mot, en aquel entro que am aquels penetres la codena de la autra part.	Then enter the two fingers, carefully, in that point where those parts of the spine are penetrated by the codena.
E aprop extrayt le cauteri; e donc son faytz quatre cauteris.	And remove the cautery; and then it is four cauteries.
E si voys, cauteriza am cauteri havent tres vernimentz.	If you see, cauterize with three fingers.
E aprop tu cura le cauteri pus que aia laysat de getar brac per trops jorns, quar mays es comferent que las autras causas precedentz en la curacio.	And then you cure the cauterization that lies flat on the thigh for too long, which may be more comfortable than the previous causes in the cure.

De cauterizacio de pes e de las coyssas.	Chapter 32 of the Capitulare Bypassus on the cauterization of the feet and thighs.
Quan les pes so apostematz en ydropitz e so repletz de aygua sitrina, cove que cauterisas les pes sobre le dos del pe in nocrati aquo que es entre le auricular e le anular, e eleva la tua ma am le cauteri e no torses aquel; e aprop eleva la tua ma, e no retornes aquela de tot, quar l’aygua satrina rezuda.	When the feet are swollen and full of stagnant water, it is necessary to cauterize the feet on the back of the thigh in a place that is between the ear and the anus, and raise your hand over the cauterization and do not pull on it; and then raise your hand, and do not return to that place for everything, as long as the stagnant water remains.

De cauterizacio de cos de ventre.	Of cauterization of things from the belly.

De cauterizacio de emorroydas antiquas.	De cauterizacio de emorroydas antiquas" translates to "On the cauterization of ancient gout". This
Quan so en la natura derier emorroydas antiquas o una de humors grossas fregas o de humiditatz corrompudas, e son curadas am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no confereys la tieua curacio, lahoras cauterisa am tres cauteris sobre le pus dejos spondilh del dos petit e petit triangular, e am cauteri desus le ombelic cays per dos ditz.	Quan so en la natura derier emorroydas antiquas o una de humors grossas fregas o de humiditatz corrompudas, e son curadas am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no confereys la tieua curacio, lahoras cauterisa am tres cauteris sobre le pus dejos spondilh del dos petit e petit triangular, e am cauteri desus le ombelic cays per dos ditz." translates to "When ancient gout or a gross humor fregus or a wet corruption is found in the body and is cured by the doctor without leaving any other cure, then three cauteries are made on the pus of the spondilh of both small and small triangular, and two cauteries are made on the ombelic cays.
E si doptas que l’estomac de lu sia enfregidat e la vianda de lu no sia degerida, e la cara de lu vezes apostemada, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre l’estomac am gran cauteri segon que es precedit; e am un cauteri sobre fietge, e am autre cauteri sobre la melsa de lu am cauteri clavilh, e leyssa le cauteri per alcun temps ubert, e aprop cura lu entro que sia sanat.	If the stomach of the patient is inflamed and the food of the patient is not digested, and the face of the patient often blushes, then do cauterize that on the stomach with a large cauterization as precedes; and a cauterization on the thigh, and another cauterization on the belly, and leave the cauterization for some time, and cure the patient when it is healthy.

De cauterizacio de atheyl aprop la abscizio de lor.	Of cauterization of hernia, the opening is appropriate.
Quan tu abscindes atheyl, lahoras tu igneys le cauteri que es asemblat a ray.	When you cauterize the hernia, you must choose the cautery that is closest to the ray.
Aprop entremet aquel ignit en aquel atheyl abscis, e ultima la tieua ma entro que pervengua le cauteri al orifici de la vena de la qual ve la sanc.	Place that cautery in the opening of the hernia, and then close it with a thread, and enter when the cauterization reaches the orifice of the vein of which you see the sanc.
E fay aquo una vetz o doas, quar si achieyl son trops, lahoras cauteriza quascun de lor segon que havem recontat, e aprop cura aquels am aquo que confereys a lor dels enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And make one or two, if they are many, cauterize each of them according to what they have found, and cure those who confer the enguents when they are healthy.
E si cauterizas am gran cauteri sobre alquatin, es mays derier en juvament.	If you cauterize with a large cauterizing iron on flesh, it will not heal well.
Capitol .xxxvi.	Capitulare de nobis et familiaribus. (Capital of our
De cauterizacio de fistolas que son faytas en la natura derie en las partidas de lu.	The treatment of cold humors that cause joint pain is called gout by doctors.
Quan la natura no obeziys a la obra la qual havem recomtada en son loc, e·l pacient es espaventat per aquo, sia sanat am cauteri.	When nature does not obey the work that has been recommended in its place, the patient is frightened by this, and it is cured with cauterization.
Donc quan ad alcun ve fistola en la natura derier, e es antiquada, corro sania de lu e humiditatz corrompudas, e donc aquo que es pus digne que cove es que proes aquela am tenta subtil, e aprop conoys la quantitat de la profunditat de lu am la devant dita tenta.	Therefore, when one finds in nature fistulas that are old, the skin is corrupted and the humors are corrupted, and therefore it is fitting that a probe be made with great care, and the depth of the hole should be measured in front of the point to be probed.
Aprop igneys le cauteri que es semblant a ray.	It is believed that the cauterization resembles fire.
E aprop met aquel cauteri ignit en aquesta fistula, e segon la quantitat en la qual intrec la tenta.	And place this cauterization on the fistula, and according to the quantity in which you have traced the point.
E itera sobre aquela le cauteri entro que sian comburitz aquels cors corrumputz tost una veguada o dos o tres, segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat.	And continue over that until the burned parts of the corrupted corpses are completely blackened or two or three times, according to your need.
E guarda te de combustio de nervi e de vena; o si fistula va al cors de la vesica o al cors del budel, lahoras guarda te de totz aquels locz; e no fassas aquo sino quan la fistula es en loc carnos e cogitas que no es penetrant.	1. Keep an eye on the combustion of nerves and veins; or if the fistula goes to the heart of the bladder or the heart of the intestine, keep an eye on all those places; and do not do this unless the fistula is in a place of flesh and thinks it is not penetrating.
E aprop cura le loc entro que sia sanat.	2. Then, if the location inside that is healthy, proceed.
E si le loc es sigillat, e so abscindidas de lu las materias, e roman ayssi per lonc temps, lahoras sapias que ja es curat entierament.	3. If the location is sealed, and the materials have been removed, and there are signs of healing over time, you know that it has been cured completely.
E si las materias no so de lu ostadas, lahoras sapias que es penetrant o en le preon de lu os corromput, o cays aquo de aquelas causas de las quals vindra rememoracio en son loc.	4. If the materials are not of the patient's own, you know that they penetrate or in the prescription of the patient they corrupt, or cause aquos to fall from those causes from which remorse will be remembered in that place.

De cauterizacio dels ronhos.	6. Of cauterization of the warts.
Quan en les ronhos endeve dolor per freg o per grossa ventozitat, e per aysso le coyt del malaute es amermat, lahoras cove que cauterizes aquel sobre les ronhos am cauteri sobre quascun ronho am cauteri clavilh del qual precesic la rememoracio.	7. When in the warts there is pain from cold or from large ventilation, and if the thigh of the patient is heating up, you know that cauterization should be done on those over the warts, am cauteri sobre quascun ronho am cauteri clavilh del qual precesic la rememoracio.
E fort leu cauterizam am le segon un petit dejos, per que vindran tres cauteris liniatz, e donc siran mays deriers en juvament.	When it is necessary to treat a wound with a cauterizing iron, then place the iron on the wound for a short time, and three lines of cauterization will be created, and fewer blisters will appear in the future.

De cauterizacio de la vesica.	On cauterization of the bladder.
Quan accideys en la vesica debelitat e mollificacio per freg e per humiditatz ayssi que·l malaute la urina no retengua, lahoras cauteriza aquel en la partida pus dejos sobre la vesiqua, la hon comensan les pels del pentenilh, e cauteriza am un cauteri en la partida dreyta, e am autre en la senestra de lu.	When the bladder becomes thin and malleable due to cold and humidity, causing the urethra to not retain urine, then cauterize the affected area at the end of the urethra with a cautery iron, and also cauterize at another point in the middle of the urethra.
E sia la longitut de quascun cauteri segon la cantitat dels not del pous; e cauteriza aquel am cauteri en la partida pus bassa del dos, o am dos cauteris si es necessitat.	And the length of each cautery should be according to the number of notches on the punch; and cauterize that at the lower end of the two, or at two points if necessary.
E sia cauteri clavilh segon que es procesit.	And the cautery should be made according to the process used.

De cauterizacio de la mayra.	On cauterization of the clitoris.
Quan veno en la mayra freg e humiditatz, e per aysso es prohibida enpreignacio, e son corrompudas las mestruas de lu, e es tardada la provocacio de lor, e accideys dolor deves le haveniment de lor, lahoras cove que·l loc sia cauterizat am tres cauteris en le circuit del ombelic, ayssi cum havem dit en le cauteri de la vesica; e am cauteri sobre le loc pus dejos del dos, o am dos cauteris, e sia le cauteri clavilh.	When cold and humidity enter the clitoris, and there is no possibility of circumcision, and the menstrual flow becomes corrupted, and its provocation is delayed, and pain occurs in the area of the clitoris, then cauterize that location with three cauteries along the umbilicus as was said in the cauterization of the bladder; and cauterize on the lower end of the two, or at two points, and make the cautery clavilh.

De cauterizacio de la dislocacio de l’anqua.	ion, specifically about cauterization for the treatment of ankle displacement. Here's a line-by-line translation of the text:
Quan humiditatz moucozas so efundudas a la partida de la anqua, e so faytas causas del yssiment del sieu loc, e senhal de lu es que la coyssa es prolonguada sobre l’autre quan so comparadas entre lor.	When humors become wet and infiltrate the knee joint, and cause inflammation of the surrounding tissues, and it is said that the thigh is extended over the other when compared to it.
E le loc de la dislocacio es atrobat en lu quays boyt.	And the location of the dislocation becomes flattened in that way.
Adonc cove que cauterizas le malaute sobre la partida de la anqua de lu am cauteri a sercle semblant, pus que tu auras senhat am tenta en le cercuit de la partida ayssi cum es revolguda, e per so que la partida caia el mieg loc del cercle.	Then, it is advised that you cauterize the thigh over the knee joint of the cauterization tool in a similar way, because you will have to touch the circumference of the joint as it swells, and so that the joint falls into its proper position.
E sia le cauteri del qual precedit la forma en la cauterizacio del estomac.	And the cauterization tools used precede the form in the cauterization of the stomach.
E si aquest cauteri no es a tu present, lahoras cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris am cauteri olivar gran.	And if this cauterization is not available to you, then perform cauterization on that part using three cauterization tools made of olive oil.
E sia fayt le cauteri segon la quantitat de la ispicitut de tota la codena; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And the amount of cauterization depends on the quantity of the dissection of the entire colon; and it should be cared for when it becomes healthy.

De cauterizacio de la vena sciatica.	Of cauterization of the sciatic vein.
Quan dolor ve en la partida de anqua, e so causa de lu freg et humiditatz, le malaute es curat am aquo que havem dit e no confereys, e aquo es antiquat, lahoras cove que tu lacses le malaute de humors grosses am pillulas fetidas o am pillulas artificials o semblantz; e aprop cauteriza aquel.	When pain is felt in the shoulder part, and its cause is due to cold and dampness, the body is treated as has been said and not confined, and this is antiquated, and one should cover the shoulder with large pills made of fresh or artificial drugs or similar substances; and it should be cauterized there.
E la manieyra del cauteri en aquela es segon dos manieyras: o cauteri am medicinas comburentz, o cauteri am foc.	And the hand of the cauterization is followed by two hands: either the cauterization is made with burning drugs, or it is made with fire.
Sira segon dos manieyras scientas, de las quals es la una que cauterizes aquel sobre la partida de l’ancha de lu am tres cauteris triangulatz segon aquesta forma; e fay am aquels bona profunditat.	Two scientific hands are used, of which one is the one that cauterizes it over the part of the ankle of the patient, and three cauterizations are made in this way, on each side; and they should be done at good depth.
E sia le spazi le qual es entre cascun cauteri la quantitat de la grossitut del dit e si le cauteri olivar o gran.	And are the spaces between each cauterization the quantity of the thickness of the drug and if the cauterization is made with oil or with a large one.
Mays alcunas veguadas sia le cauteri sobre le mieg loc sobre le cap de l’anquan per que son quatre cauteris.	Some may be that the cauterization is made over the middle of the head of the ankle for that there are four cauterizations.
E si vols, cauteriza am le cercle del qual es precesida la forma en la cauterizacio de la dislocacio de l’anqua, la i que sia cercle continent e comburey la ispicitut de tota la codena.	And if you want, cauterize on the circle that is preceded by the form in the cauterization of the dislocation of the ankle, and that it is a circle continuous and burning the entire chain.
E aquesta es la manieyra de cauteri in ciatiqua quan dolor es adherent al anqua e no es estenduda entro a la coyssa.	This is the method of cauterization in cold cases when pain is adhered to the ankle and not extended within the thigh.
Mays si es estenduda entro a la coyssa, lahoras cauteriza aquel am dos cauteris sobre la coyssa sobre le loc al qual envireys le malaute que es la dolor; e am un cauteri sobre la cavilha per quatre ditz un pauc deves la part cilvestra.	If the wound is extended to the thigh, then burn it with two burns on the thigh at the location where the evacuation of the evil will cause pain; and a burn on the cavity with four cuts of about a finger's length on the part that is most affected.
E si le cauteri cutellar, e sia la profunditat del cauteri segon la quantitat de la ispicitut de la codena.	If the burn is deep, and the depth of the burn depends on the amount of the intestine that is pushed out.
E si le malaute envireys que la dolor es estenduda entro al loc prop les ditz des pes, lahoras cauteriza aquel aqui on envireys am cauteri per tres puntz o quatre o mays si indigeys de aquel.	If the evacuation causes the pain to spread throughout the area where the cut was made, then burn it with three or four or more points of burn if directed by the evacuation.
E si le malaute envireys dolor esser dejos le donolh ves la coyssa, lahoras cauteriza aquel aqui am un cauteri cutellar.	If the evacuation causes pain to be felt further down the thigh, then burn it with a deep burn on the thigh.
E guarda te en tota cauterizacio que no ultimes am le cauteri en tant que comburas nervi o gran arceria, e que per aquo a tu es sobre le malaute mal noccument o contraccio.	And be careful in all burning that you do not use the burn as a nerve or great artery, and that for this reason you may cause the patient to suffer from pain or contraction.
E yeu ja e vist un e autre de aquels les quals cauterizero sobre la cavilha e ultimero en la cauterizacio, e la cama foc inflada entro que la tumor aconseguit lo pe, e foc perforat e corromput tot le pe.	And you have seen one and the other of those which were burned on the cavity and after in the burning, and the bed was inflamed throughout that the tumor achieved the knee, and the bed was burned and corrupted and corrupted the whole knee.
E aprop accidic fort solucio de ventre, e aprop aquo la mort.	When a sudden and serious condition of the stomach occurs, and it leads to death.
E si la dolor es en dos partidas ensemps cauteriza quascuna segon aquesta manieyra.	If the pain is in two parts, then cauterize each side of this handle.
E diysero les savis alcus en la cauterizacio de anqua cauteri del qual aquesta es la manieyra: fay semblant a cercle de ferr del qual le cercuit sia la maytat de un palm; e sia deves le sieu orrifici segon la grossesa de un os de datil o mens un pauc.	And use the following methods in cauterization of anguish: make it resemble a circle of iron, where the circumference is the largest part of a palm; and be sure to use it according to the largest size of a sharp bone or a few.
E dedintz aquel cercle sia un autre tertz; e sia le spazi le qual es entre lor la quantitat del notz del pous; e sian aquels cercles ubertz de dos partidas; e sia la longitut de aquels cays un notz o dos notz, e fay en aquels margue de ferr decentment apparelhat en les cercles; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	And make that circle another one; and be sure to use it according to the quantity of the bone's notch; and those circles should be divided into two parts; and the length of those sides is a notch or two notches, and make those edges slightly visible in the circles; and this is the form of it:
Aprop sia ignit en le foc entro que s’enrogesisca e gete scintillas, e aprop sia pausat sobre la partida del anqua, le malaute colcat sobre le latz sa.	Then place it in the fire when it is wrapped, and let it emit sparks, and place it over the part of anguish, the thighs covered with a cloth.
E donc cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris redontz en una veguada.	And then cauterize that part three times in a line.
E aprop layssa aquel per tres jorns; aprop emplastre aquel am boder e layssa la plagua uberta per trops dias; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And let it stay for three days; and apply this ointment to the affected area multiple times; and care for it so that it becomes healthy again.
Diys Albucasis : o, filhs, de aquesta specia de cauteri pauc havem usat per la terror del reguardament de lu, e per aquo que paucs havem trobatz les quals reguardan sobre lu.	Albucasis: Oh, sons, of this kind of cauterization few have used due to the fear of the gaze of it, and therefore few have found those who look at it.
Mays dels bos cauteris a lu qui les sufferta, et atroba am aquel le loc de lu.	May the cauterizations be fewer on those who suffer from this, and they will diminish that place of theirs.
Mays cauteri am medicinas adhurentz es que tu fassas dos cercles haventz armula perforada en la qual deyssen le guaffo de la porta de ferr; sia la longuitut de la paretz en la nauteza de lor sian dos nozes o quays aquels.	Less cauterizations are used in medicine because you make two circles with armillary spheres perforated in the one that has the gullet of the door of iron; the length of the sides is in the youth of them or as those.
E si le spazi le qual es entre quascu la quantitat de la grossitut del dit; e sian ubertz dejos e desus, e sian que contenguan se entre lor segon aquesta forma:	And if the space is less than the quantity of the size of it; and they are opened further and deeper, and they hold that between them this form:
E aprop pausa sobre la partida de la anqua le malaut jasent sobre le latz sa, e comprem la tua ma sobre la partida de la anqua; e aprop pren de aygua cauda e fon la entre dos cercles, e la qualiditat de aquela sia am le foc petit a petit, e te aquela per la quantitat de una hora, e sufferta le malaute la mordicacio e la adhustio de lu — quar aquel atrobo mordicacio ayssi cum de foc — entro que cesse la mordicacio.	And place your hand over the end of the ankle, and compre the tua ma over the end of the ankle; and take water from the tail and pour it between two circles, and that quality of that is as the small fire little by little, and you that for the quantity of one hour, and suffer the malaute the mordicacio and the adhustio of lu — quar that atrobo mordicacio ayssi como de foc — after that the mordicacio ceases.
E aprop eleva la tua ma am le instrument et abstergeys l’aygua cauda de tota la anqua am aygua dousa.	When raising your arm with the instrument, avoid touching the wet tail of the entire water needed for the wettest water.
E aprop leyssa aquel per tres jorns e pausa sobre aquel boder entro que sia la negror de la adhustio remauguda, e leyssa aquo per alcus jorns, e correra de lu poyredura; aquest es derier en juvament.	And press on that border for three days and then continue pressing for three more days, and run the poultice; this helps in relief.
E aprop cura aquel am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And cure that part as soon as it becomes healthy.
E si la dolor es extenduda entro la coyssa o la camba, fay a lu estatua en lu que contengua aygua segon que es feyt en la anqua engualment.	And if the pain extends to the thigh or leg, make that statue in it which contains water according to what is made in the wetting of the joint.
E aquesta es la manieyra de aygua cauda, e yeu ja he scrit aquela en le tractat de la rectificacio de medicinas.	And this is the statue of wet tail water, and you have already written that in the book of the correction of medicines.
Recipe de alcali e de caus no extinta de amdos ana partida una, e trissa les e pausa en una ola nova de la qual la partida dejos sia perforada per un petit trauc, segon la quantitat que intre en lu ray.	Recipe for alkaline and inextinguishable fire of one part, and add water to it and let it rest in a new wave of the quality that is poured into the ring, according to the amount that enters into it.
E pausa dejos le fons de la ola autra ola enveyriada, e gete sobre aquel alcali e caus viva de aygua doussa la qual cobra aquels per un dit, e pus que tu compremes aquels am la tieua ma per bona compressio, e leyssa la hola que deyssenda de lu aygua aguda en la partida dejos a la ola enveyriada.	And let the fountain of the other wave be poured into another carried wave, and add water to the live alkaline and fire of water that requires two drops of the quality that is given by one drop, and say that you understand this in the first part for good compression, and press the hole that comes from the hot water in the fountain into the carried wave.
E aprop ajusta tota aquela aygua, e geta la sobre autra caus viva e autre alcali renovelatz, quar aquela lahoras sira de mot forta acuitat, la qual es aministrada en motas operacios de medicina e en cauterizacio dels autres membres, quar operacio fa de foc.	And properly adjust that water, and place it on another to live and another alkali, for that if it is made of strong acidity, it will be maintained in the operations of medicine and cauterization of other members, for which operation a fire is used.
E so de las medicinas alcunas am las quals es cauterizat ancha, ayssi cum tezizic e mel anacrat e caus am sabo enayssi que sian mesclatz.	And some of the medicines are some that are cauterized wide, as they are with thread and honey, and cause a sabose in which they are mixed.

And Guilia recounts a man of ancient times about the operation and cure, which is cured of pain in the knee and sciatic nerve, and many are the benefits of that, and it is said that no other cure is needed, and it is healed by a vein such as recommended, where much of that intestine is placed in bath and already knows how to do that.
Et es que sia pres de certarragi vert, e si no es atrobat vert, sia presa figua recent; e mot sia trissada am un pauc de grays e sia pausat sus la anqua en la qual es la dolor, o en la coyssa, o en la camba, e sia liat.	And if it is near a certain tree, and if it is not dry, then the female genitalia is held in recent; and if it is cut off with a few gray hairs, and placed on the knee where the pain is, or on the thigh, or on the chest, and it is seen.
E sia layssat per la cantitat de tres horas o per la quantitat que·l malaute centa cedacio de la adhustio.	If the pain is not relieved after three hours or when the patient has lost three pints of blood.
E aprop met aquel en banh e donc quan le cors de lu sia enrozat, entromet aquel en le sol, quar la dolor cessa e es sanat.	Then apply this to the affected area and when the patient's body is swollen, enter it into the ground, and the pain will cease and be healed.
E sapias que no cove que alcu use de cauteri am aquestas medicinas sino aprop la evacuacio del cors.	Do you know that this treatment is not used with cauterization unless the evacuation of the chest is necessary?

De cauterizacio de podagra e de dolor de juncturas.	On the cauterization of gout and joint pain.
Quan dolor de juncturas son faytas per humors fregas les quals so enfundutz a quascun membre del cors, lahoras quan veno dolors en los pes, de costuma dels metges es que aquo apelen podragua propriament.	When joint pain is caused by cold humors that infiltrate each part of the body, and pain occurs in the feet, it is customarily called gout by doctors.
E donc cum es curada podagra de causa frega am manieyra de cura e no so remaugudas las dolors, lahoras las remau cauteri.	When treating gout caused by cold humors in the feet and not causing further pain, then use cauterization.
E es que tu cauterizas aquel aprop evacuacio en le circuit de la junctura del pe am motz cauteris.	And is that you cauterize that appropriate evacuation in the circuit of the joint of the foot with the desired cauterization.
E sia cauteri olivar del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And is this the form of the cauterization:
E si es necessitat que puntz sia fayt sobre la fassia del pe, lahoras fay am cauteri de punt.	If it is necessary to make points on the surface of the foot, then do so with a pointed cautery.
E si las dolors pujan entro als denolhs o a las autras juncturas, e aquo motas vetz s’endeve, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre quascun donolh am tres cauteris o quatre de tota partida am aquest cauteri olivar.	If the pain spreads to the neighboring joints or other joints, and it is necessary to stop the pain, then use cauterization on each knee with three or four points of this cauterization oil.
E si motz cauteris que aquestz cauteris sian a tu necessaris, lahoras cauteriza aquel e no premas trop la tua ma am le cauteri abans, sia tant solament enviro la specitut de la codena.	If these cauterizations are necessary for you, then use cauterization on that and do not press too hard with your hand, only around the specific area of the knee.
E si las dolors pugan entro al donolh e·l dos, lahoras aministra le cauteri le qual havem dit en le sieu capitol.	If the pain spreads to both knees, then apply the cauterization that was told in the capital speech.
E si las dolors so en las mas tant solament, e es apelada suagra, lahoras puncta en le circuit dels focils ayssi cum se revolvo, puncta en aquels dos linhas.	If the pain is in the most part of the body, and it is called sugar, then make points in the circuit of the limbs as they rotate, make points in those two lines.
E si reman de las dolors en les ditz, lahoras puncta en le cercuit dels focils sobre quascun notz e sobre la pinche de la ma.	If pain remains in these parts, then point on the circuit of the sweat glands over each nook and cranny of the body.
E si las dolors pugan aprop alscus jorns als coydes o als muscles, lahoras cauteriza les quascus de tota part dels ajutoris.	If pain worsens in these areas as the joints or muscles, then cauterize the entire part of the assistants.
E no evacuas le malaute de bon regiment e de recepcio de medicinas, quar si es fayt bon regiment e flacma es evacuada am aquest cauteri sira sanat, Dieus ajudan.	And do not remove the badly managed patient and the reception of medicines, for if it is well managed and the condition improves, this cauterization will be beneficial, God helps.
Capitol .xlv.	Chapter 45.
De cauterizacio de rompeduras.	On the cauterization of wounds.
Quan endeve rompedura en les angonars e diysendo les budels denant l’atela al genetiu, e aquo es comensan de aprop, lahoras cove que tu mandas al malaute layssar la sua comestio en le sieu dia e que use de causas leniens per so que la fenda deyssenda del sieu ventre.	When a wound occurs in the ankles and testicles, and the intestine passes through the hernia to the abdomen, then do as follows: first, order that the patient fasts on the day you command, and use gentle causes for so that the needle of the abdomen does not come out.
E aprop segua le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos, e comanda a lu que tengua le sieu ale entro que sia foro getat o aparesca l’atela o·l budels.	And follow the patient on your side over the abdomen, and command that you hold the abdomen until it is clear or there is a sign of the hernia or the intestine.
E aprop retorna aquel am les tieus ditz e senha am tenta la ruptura sobre le os del pentenilh am senhal la extremitat del qual sia semblant a la maytat de cercle a las subiranas partidas del cors.	And then return that to the thighs and try again on the bones of the patella and send it to the end of which seems like the gout of a circle in the subcutaneous parts of the body.
E aprop igneys le cauteri del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And approximately how this cauterization of this kind is done:
entro que sia mot rog e gete cintilhas.	When there is a hot pain in the body, it is called fever.
E aprop reduzeys le budel o l’atela a la sua conquavitat, e aprop pause la sua ma sobre le loc per so que le budel no yesqua.	Then return the intestine or hernia to its cavity, and place your hand over the area to prevent the intestine from coming out.
E tu ja has ubert entre las coyssas del malaute e dejos lu as pausat un coyssi, et autre servent sia sus las cambas de lu, e autre sus le pietz de lu, le qual tengua las suas mas.	You have already opened the space between the patient's thighs, placed a cushion under them, another servant on their legs, and another on their chest, holding their hands.
E aprop pausa le cauteri sobre aquel senhal am la tua ma am cauteri stan dreyt, e te aquel entro que am lu consieguas le os del pentenilh entro al mieg del duiduni; e itera am aquel autra veguada si a tu aquel no has conseguit en la primieyra veguada entro al os.	Then pause the cautery on that spot with your hand, and if you can feel the pulp of the nail entering the hollow of the toe; and repeat it on another place if you haven't succeeded in the first attempt.
E observa saviament del ysiment del budel en la hora de la tua cauterizacio, que no comburas aquel budel per so que sobre le malaute no vengua in mort o autre gran malicia.	And observe carefully the condition of the intestine during your cauterization, that you do not burn that intestine because it does not come out over the thigh or other great misfortune.
E sapias que quan tu am le cauteri no atenhas le os, no confereys la tua operacio.	And you know that if you do not feel the pain, do not consider your operation successful.
E cove que·l cauteri dels enfants sia subtil segon le gran e la mesura de lor.	And make sure that the cauterization of children is done with great care according to their size and measure.
E aprop cura le loc del cauteri per tres dias am boder entro que sia remauguda la scara del foc.	And keep the site of the cauterization for three days, so that the wound of the focus does not become worse.
E aprop cura aquel am les autres enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And keep that for the other patients who are cured.
E le malaute sia jasent sobre le sieu dos per xl dias entro que sia sigillat le loc e la plagua.	If the patient's thigh is put on the right side for fourteen days, so that the wound is sealed and there is no discharge.
E cove que pauses le nutriment de lu segon la longitut del temps de la curacio de lu le qual le linesca le ventre de lu, e que le budel no yesca fora deves le esforsament de guerir.	And cover that you pause the nutrition according to the length of time of the cure of the patient, and that the intestine does not come out because of the effort to heal.
E aprop quan se vol levar aprop xl dias, lahoras aministra liament decentment fayt, e tengua aquel per autres xl jorns.	And when you want to leave after fourteen days, administer appropriate care, and hold it for another fourteen days.
E sia mermat de trebalh e de replecio de vianda e de beure, e de votz vehementz, quar quan usa de aquest regiment de sanacio entiera sira sanat.	And it is necessary to work and eat and drink, and to exercise forcefully, when you use this entire regimen of therapy, your health will be completely cured.
E yeu diyre la curacio de las rupturas en las autras partidas del ventre, e so al comensament, e vols que no treguan, lahoras cauterisa la ruptura d’aquel am cauteri redon segon la quantitat de lu, e sia aquo que es exhurit de la codena ayssi cum la tersa partida de lu; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit, e no es ajustat.	And you tell the cure of the ruptures in other parts of the stomach, and so on, and you want that they do not happen again, then cauterize the rupture with cauterization according to the quantity of the focus, and it is that it is exhausted from the codena as the last part of the stomach; and keep that which has been said and do not adjust.
E ja diyssero alcus primiers que ruptura sia cauterizada am cauteri triangular segon aquesta forma, pus que es senhada am tenta:	When the first wound is made, the incision is cut with a triangular cautery according to this form, because it is easier to sew:
e es pausada linha que eys per la latitut en le latz pus sobira de la ruptura, e autra linha al desus; e depausa la tua ma am un cauteri clavilh, mays le primier cauteri es pus leugier e milhor.	A line is placed perpendicular to the line of the wound, and another line at the end; then remove your hand from the cauterizing iron, which is better than the first one that was pushed in more.

De cauterizacio de torcio.	Of cauterization of torsion.
Quan endeve en alscus membres per cazement o per percussio dolor e persevera aquela dolor per lonc temps e no comfereys al u curacio am medicinas, lahoras cove que cauterizes am cauteri de punt.	When pain persists in any member due to strain or impact and does not relieve for a long time and does not please the physician's care, it is necessary to cauterize with a point.
E sia le cauteri de tot membre segon la magnitut e la parvitat de lu, e vertut e develitat de lu, e locacio de torcio e dolor de lu.	And the cauterization of each member according to its magnitude and thickness, as well as its development and twist, and the location of the twist and the pain in the member.
Donc si·s sanat per le primier cauteri, bo es; e sino, lahoras itera sobre lu le cauteri; quar de costuma de aquelas dolors es que sian punctatz de membre ad aquel membre le qual apropinque al u, per que cove que consieguas aquels am cauteri entro que·l malaute sia sanat.	If the patient is healed by the first cauterization, so be it; and if not, you will repeat the cauterization over it. De cauterizacio de lepra.	1. "Capitol .xlvii." is a Roman numeral that translates to "47
Les lebros alcunas veguadas am cauteri per mot gran juvament, e magerment si la specia de lepra que es fayta per putrefaccio de flacma e de melencolia.	2. "De cauterizacio de lepra" translates to "Of cauterization of leprosy.
E donc cum tu vols cauterizar aquel, considera si la lepra es comussan e as aquela curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no deysen, ni esta, e temes sobre le malaute que la corrupcio comprehenda tot le cors de lu e tota la compleccio de lu, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre le cap am v cauteris: am un en le mieg loc del cap, e am le segon pus dejos de lu, eves le front a la fi dels cabels; e amdos sobre dos corns; e am un detras, sobre la nuca o servitz.	When you want to cauterize that part, consider if leprosy is present and whether it has been cured as said in the division and not done, nor this, and fears about the thigh that corruption comprehends the whole body of him and the entire complexion of him, then cauterize that over the head with a pointed cautery: one on the left side of the head, and one further down, and then to the front of the hair; and two on the back, over the nape or servants.
E ultima la tua ma am le cauteri un pauc entro que emprema en le os una petita empressio, e de lu sian deslocadas las scorsas, per so que la expiracio de grossas vapors sia alleujada de lu; e cauteriza sobre la melsa segon que es precesit.	Finally, when the cauterization has a little effect on the bones, and the scars are displaced, because the expiration of large vapors is relieved from him; then cauterize on the surface next to the pressure.
E si la lepra es ja expanduda sobre le malaute e apar manifestament, lahoras cove que tu cauterizas aquel am aquels cauteris les quals havem ditz en le cap; e am cauteri sobre la extremitat del nas, e am dos cauteris sobre las doas maysselas, e am dos cauteris sobre dos spondils del col, e am vi cauteris sobre les spondils del dos, e am un gran sobre les spondils prop de la coeta, e un sobre la cotea , e am dos sobre las anquas, e am un sobre quascuna anqua, e am dos sobre les donols e un sobre quascun donolh, e am dos sobre les coydes, e am dos sobre les muscles, e am dos las teneretutz del sieu pietz; e cauteriza aquel sobre totas las juncturas dels ditz de las mas e dels pes, e sobre quascun talon dels sieus pes, e sobre les foscils de las suas mas.	If leprosy has already expanded over the thigh and manifestly appears, then you should cover that which has been said in the head with cauterization: one on the extremity of the nose, and two on the eyes, and two on the collarbones, and two on the spine, and one on the spine of the back, and one over the shoulder blade, and one near the shoulder, and one over the shoulder, and one over the shoulder, and one over each shoulder, and one over each shoulder blade, and one over each elbow, and one over each wrist, and one over each knee, and one over each thigh, and one over each calf, and one over each ankle, and one over each toe, and one over each muscle; and cauterize that over all the joints of the toes and feet, and on each toe of the feet, and on each nail of the fingers.
E guarda te dels nervis les quals so sobre le talo que no comburas aquels.	When you hold the nerves that are over the sole of the foot that do not burn, it means that the treatment is working.
E alcunas veguadas es cauterizat am un cauteri sobre le os del pentenilh e am autre sobre la boca del stomac, e autre sobre le fietge.	If some wounds are cauterized with a cautery over the bones of the pelvis and another over the mouth of the stomach, and another over the thigh, it means that the treatment is working.
E sapias que quant mays ajustas cauteris, tant es mays juvatiu e mays conferent; e sapias que le malaute no ha en le cauteri dolor, ayssi cum han les sas, per so quar le cors de lu ja es stupefayt.	You know that the more you cauterize, the less effective and painful it is; and you know that the thigh does not have pain in the cauterization, just as they have them, because the body of the patient has already been stunned.
E cove que les cauteris sian grans o paucs segon les membres e las juncturas segon que es precedit de las specias dels ferramentz.	And know that the cauterizations are large or small according to the members and joints, according to what precedes the specific tools of the instruments.
E aprop cura le cauteri am farina de errs coyta am mel e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And care for the cauterization with flour, salt, and melted wax, and another cure if it is healthy.

De cauterizacio de stupor.	About the cauterization of stunned.
Quan alcun membre es stabozit o adormit e es curat am medicinas, olis e emplastres, e no es sanat, lahoras tu cauteriza aquel membre stabozit am cauteris segon que merita la grandesa del membre o la parvitat de lu.	When a member becomes numb or unconscious and is treated with medicines, oils, and plasters, and does not heal, then you should cauterize that stunned member according to the size of the member or its smallness.
E sia lo tieu cauteri intrant la ispicitut de la codena un pauc.	When the hot cauterization is inserted into the skin of the back, a few drops of blood will come out.
E aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then apply this ointment to the affected area to make it heal.
E alscunas veguadas es cauterizada alcuna stupor le qual endeve a las mas e als pes, e als spondils del dos e ves le eysiment dels nervis les quals mavon aquel membre, e es remauguda la stupor.	Sometimes, cauterization is done on a part of the body that does not have nerves, such as the back, spine, and neck, and it does not cause pain to the member, and the wound heals quickly.
Mays no prusuma sobre aquo sino aquel que es savi en la anotomia dels membre e de la egressio dels nervis tot le cors moventz. De cauterizacio de albaras que es morfea.	Of cauterization of burns that are fatal.

De cauterizacio de corrodent.	which can be translated as "On the cauterization of corrosions". Here's the full translation of the source
Corrodent es corrupcio ambulant en le membre, la qual corrodeys aquel ayssi cum a foc comedent lenha secca.	that corrosions are wandering corruptions in the body, which corrupt like fire consumes dry wood.
Donc si vezes aquel corrodent en loc le qual sufferte cauteri am foc, lahoras tu igneys cauteris clavils motz paucs, e grans segon que es convenent en aquel loc en le qual es corrodent.	If you ever notice that the affected area is burned in place where it suffered cauterization, then you should know that few cautery claws are needed, and some larger ones depending on the place where it is burned.
E aprop cauteriza aquel de tota partida entro que erradiques tota la corrosio e no romangua alcuna causa de lu.	Then cauterize that of the entire affected area until you completely eradicate the corrosion and do not leave any cause for it.
E aprop leyssa aquel per tres dias, e pausa sobre les locs cauterizats solpre trissat am oli mesclat entro que las scaras sian totas eradicadas e tota la corrupcio.	And keep that for three days, and then place your hand over the cauterized areas once a day until all the wounds are completely eradicated and all the corruption is eliminated.
E aprop cura aquel am enguentz carn engendrantz.	And treat that with an ointment that stops the growth of flesh-producing tissue.
Mays si aprop tres dias vezes que la carn nasca sana en la qual no es corrupcio, bo es; mays sino, lahoras itera le cauteri sobre aquo que es romas en les locs corrumputz.	If after three days the flesh has healed in that place where there is no corruption, then it is; otherwise, repeat the cauterization over the areas that are still burning in the corrupted places.
E corrodent es medicat alcunas vetz am medicina aguda, quar aquela es meza en loc de cauteri.	And corrosion is treated by some doctors with acute medicine, four times a day in the place of cauterization.
Mays empero cauteri am foc es de pus leugier juvament.	However, cauterization is not always effective in relieving pressure.
E yeu ja e dit la curacio de lu am medicina aguda en la divisio, e donc pren aquela quan de lu auras endegencia.	When I have already spoken of the cure of the patient in the division, and now take that which is necessary for the emergency.

De cauterizacio de albati accidentz al cors.	A burn from an acupuncture accident can occur on the chest.
