E si roman alcuna partida dels osses petitz e satagias, lahoras pren aquela am facilitat am aquo que es deves tu dels sturmentz; e aprop aquo cura la plagua am lichinis e enguentz les quals havem ditz.	If you encounter any small, sharp bones and joints, then grasp them with that ease which is due to you as a surgeon; and thereby cure the pain and find out which ones have caused it.
E l’autra manieyra de operacio es leugiera, longinqua de paor, la qual diyssec Gualia e la lauzec per gran lausor; e aquest es le sermo de lu: necessari es a tu en le comensament que comenses descobrir la partida del os del loc en le qual es la fractura pus vehement e pus manifesta, entro que quan auras descubert aquela partida e auras pausat dejos lu la extremitat de aquest inscissori lent e alegre del qual aquesta es la forma:	The other hand of the operation is longer, taking more time, which is praised by Guy de Champagne and his followers; and this is the saying of it: It is necessary for you at the beginning to discover the part of the bone in which the fracture was made with great force and manifestation, until when you have discovered that part and have paused at the end of this slow but pleasant cut of this type:
E es que la partida lenticular es leon e no inscideys alcuna causa, e la partida aguda es de lu en dos latz avantz en longitut, ayssi cum vezes; que la partida lenticular sia ajustada al ciphac am la facia de lu inscident aguda en le os.	E is that the lenticular part is like a lion and does not penetrate any cause, and the sharp part is on two lateral sides in length; which means that the lenticular part should be adjusted to the cipher am the face of the sharp bone at the incident agua in the os.
E aprop percuteys sobre le inscissori de una partida am un petit malhet entro que inscidas tot le os am facilitat ayssi cum es revolvut, e tu sias segur del pannicol que no accida en lu accident que temas en denguna manieyra, e si le medicant14 era le pus fol de totz les homes e le mays ignorant de lor; certament, e si era dorment.	E if you cut through the incision of a part with a small malhet when all the bones are cut, and you are sure that the panicoil will not happen in this accident that you fear in any hand, and if the physician 14 were the fool of all men and the most ignorant of them; certainly, and if he were asleep.
Lahoras si romania alcuna causa annexa al os del pannicol en alcus locs de os, inscidira aquel de lu am la extremitat del inscissori aquel lenticular, e deliuraria aquel de lu am facilitat, quar es deliurat de lu ses nocument e ses paor.	If the pain is caused by any reason and attaches to the bone of the ankle in certain places of the bone, it will be located at the extremity of the ankle bone that lenticular, and will be facilitated at the place where the pain is located, which is facilitated by the bones of the foot.
E si fractura del os no penetra entro al pannicol, e aquo que es abscidit o es ostat del os es la facia de lu, e roman en lu asperitat e satagias subtils, lahoras cove que razas aquela asperitat e erradiques aquelas satagias am razoris subtils per les quals tu has preparat le nombre, de diversas quantitatz per que sia a tu possible administrar de aquels en tot loc les pus convenientz de lor e le pus dreyt de aquels segon aquo en que te perduzeys la tua operacio aquel os trencat e la figura de lu.	If the fracture does not penetrate into the bone, and that which is separated or remains on the bone is the face of the foot, and there are roughnesses and subtle spots on it, it is likely that those roughnesses and subtle spots are caused by the razor blades that you have prepared for different quantities so that you can possibly administer those in all places with appropriate pus for them and the pus of the second part where you lose your operation that broken bone and the figure of the foot.
E cove que administres en la tua razio am la qual razes le os al comensament le pus lat de aquels razoris, e aprop usa aprop lu del pus subtil de lu, e no cesses far aquo segon continuitat entro que pervenguas ad aministrar le pus teon e·l pus subtil de totz aquels.	And cover that you administer in your reason with the one that raises the bone at the beginning with the purulent pus of those razor blades, and use as much as possible of the subtle pus of the foot, and do not stop giving until you have given all the purulent pus of all those.
Mays en quascuna de las autras fracturas petitas capillars e fractura subtil, cove que administres cura segon aquo que perduseys ad rectificacio de lu.	When there is any small fracture of the hair or subtle fracture, follow the treatment that you have used to correct the position of the bone.
E es causa que no es ameguada sobre totz les quals han studi en aquela art.	When it comes to the cause, it is not expected that all those who have studied in that art will be able to master it.
E stec sobre aquo que nos scriut havem mostrat en grans fracturas.	And as they have shown us in great fractures.
E si le pannicol es retangut quan tu erradiques le os, lahoras cove que prenguas drap de li segon la quantitat de la plagua, e submergeys aquel en oli rozat, e pausa aquel sobre le orrifici de la plagua; e aprop pren autre drap doblat o triplicat e submergeys lu en vi e oli rozat e pausa aquel sobre drap prim e fay aquo al pus leugierament que podes sobre aquel, que no graves le ciphac; e aprop administra sobre aquel liament lat, e no strenhas aquel sino per quantitat que tengua la plagua tant solament.	And if the panoply is tightened when you reduce the bone, you will find that you hold one handful of cloth for each unit of plague, and submerge that in warm olive oil, and place it over the orifice of the plague; and take another doubled or tripled handful of cloth and submerge that in warm olive oil and place it over the first handful and press aloe on that to alleviate the pain you can apply to that, not straining it beyond what the plague can bear only; and administer aloe to that part, and do not squeeze it beyond the quantity of plague you have.
E layssa aquel am aquesta cura per un dia o per dos entro que sias segur de apostema caut; e aprop deslia aquel e aprop aministra medicinas am las quals es superflua siccitat, ayssi cum razitz de lin e farina de errs, e polvera de enses e de aristologia, e de semblantz ad aquels.	And keep that on for one day or two after you are sure of the cure; and remove it and administer medicines as needed for thirst, such as linen and flour, and powder of enses and alchemy, and like substances for those.
E es que tu fassas de aquestas medicinas polvera que sia pulverizada sobre la plagua, ayssi cum son secas; e universalment, administra en aquel tota medicina de proprietat de la qual es que abstergesca e no mordique.	It is that you make of these powders that they be powdered over the skin, as they are dry; and generally, they are administered in this entire medicine of whose property it is that it purges and does not irritate.
E guarda te segon la tua vertut que la plagua en la tua curacio sia neta; e no sia en lu surdicia de enguent ni autra; ni no layssas agreguar virulencia en lu; quar quan es ajustada sobre le pannicol del cervel, corromp aquel e poyreys aquel, e accideys sobre le malaute aprop aquo malicia maligna.	You should follow your virtue that is causing the plague in your curacy; and do not be in its negligence of engagement nor another; nor should you add virulence to it; for when it is adjusted over the pannicule of the brain, corrupt that and prick that, and ascend upon the malady with that malicious wickedness.
E accideys en le ciphac del cap, cum de lu es mondificat le os e majorment quan es menspresada la cura de lu, e es negror en la superficia de lu; e donc considera lahoras si accideys al malaute les accidentz que havem ditz, sapias que es parnicios ses tot dopte.	And ascend upon the skull of the head, when it is made monstrous by the bone and more so when the care of it is removed, and darkens in its surface; and then consider that if you ascend to the malady the accidents that have been told are true.
E si no accideys negror sino de la medicina que es pausada desus, e es en vertut de aquela medicina que fassa aquela negror, lahoras cove que tu prenguas de mel una partida e de oli rozat partidas iii, e am aquels linieys un drap, e aprop pausa aquel sobre le ciphac; e aprop cura aquel am las specias de curacio que conveneys entro que sia sanat.	And if you do not darken but from the medicine that is placed below, and it is virtue of that medicine that causes that darkness, then know that you hold in your hand one part and three parts of olive oil, and apply those lines to the skull, and place that over the crypt; and care for that with the specifics of cure that are suitable according to what is healthy.
Capitol .iii.	Chapter 3.
De restauracio del nas quan es trincat.	When doing a nose job (restoration) it is customary to use cold humors that infiltrate each part of the body,
Sapias que no es trencat del nas sino doas partidas ensemps pus sobiranas, o una de aquelas alcunas veguadas, per so quar en lu has dos osses, quar la partida dejos es cartillaginosa, e no es trencada e no accideys a lu sino atricio e tortuositat e sinuitat.	It is not the nose that is cut but rather the bones that are divided into parts and then removed, or one of those some cartilages, for if you have two bones, the part where the nose is located is cartilaginous, and it is not cut and does not fracture, neither at the nose nor in its surrounding areas.
Mays si es trencada la una de las doas partidas de lu, lahoras cove que tu intrometas le dit petit en le sieu nas, e que engualhas aquela fractura dedintz am le tieu dit indic, e am le dit pous defora, entro que retorne le nas segon la sua figura natural.	If one of the parts of the bone is cut, you should know that you insert the small piece into the nose, and that you mend the fracture at the top of the small piece, and at the point where it was broken, and then return the nose to its natural shape.
E sia fayt aquo per tu am facilitat, e guarda te que no caja per aquela tua operacio sobre le malaute delor.	And this is for your convenience, and keep in mind that you should not close the wound for your operation on the patient's thigh.
E si la fractura es en la pus sobirana partida del nas, e le dit no perve ad aquela, lahoras cove que sia equat am la extremitat del ray en le qual sia petita grossitut.	If the fracture is in the upper part of the bone division and the small piece does not fit well at the end of the bone, then you should know that it is necessary to make it fit well at the end of the bone.
E si la fractura es en doas partidas, lahoras tu fay le semblant de aquo.	If the fracture is in several parts, you should make it look like that.
E coyta te am restauracio de lu en le primier dia de la fractura, si es possible; e sino, lahoras aprop le vii o·l x deves le repaus del apostema caut.	When restoring the thigh on the first day of the fracture, if possible; and if not, then use about the sixth or seventh part of the cautery for the closure of the incision.
E aprop entromet en la extremitat del nas una meca de drap de li, si la fractura es en una partida, o metz doas calguas, si la fractura es en doas partidas, e sia en la calgua grossitut de tanta quantitat que umpla le trauc del nas.	And insert the end of a draping bandage into the tip of the nose, if the fracture is in one piece, or if it is in several pieces, and if it is in the largest piece, so that it fills the cavity of the nose.
E diysso alcus dels antics restauradors que las calguas sian enfundudas en boder, e sian permudadas en tot dia, mays no es vist a mi; habantz cove que la meca sia enfunduda en album de huou comfit am polvera de moli; e aprop layssa la qualgua entro que l’os sia fermat e sia endurazida la cartillage.	And tell the ancient restorers that the splints should be wrapped in albumen or powdered chalk, and that the meca should be wrapped in a cloth; and lay it aside when the bone is fixed and the cartilage is endurable.
E alcunas veguadas sia entromes en le nas, en loc de calgua, pena de auca pus que es envolopada de drap de li leon; e sia que ja te la fractura del nas pus vehement e que le malaute no sia prohibit de inspiracio.	And some wounds may be in the nose, instead of splints, because leon's drapery is too thick; and it is that you have fractured the nose before and that the thigh is not restricted from inspiration.
E aquesta causa no es a tu necessaria; e si voles, fay aquo, e si voles, fay calguas.	This cause is not necessary for you; and if you wish, do this, and if you wish, make splints.
E si accideys autra veguada apostema caut, emplastra le nas am cerot o am coto enfus en vi agre e oli rozat, o am diaquilon.	If another swelling occurs after the cauterization, apply the following plaster: mix the honey or the wax in a mortar and pour it into a thin layer on the affected part, or use a poultice.
Mays si no accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que emplaustres aquel defora am farina de sizami e am polvera de enses cofitz am album de huou; e aprop pausa sobre lu stopa leon, e no lies le nas am alcuna causa.	If you do not have swelling after cauterization, you should know that you can apply a poultice made of flour and ermine powder on the affected area; and place a piece of cloth over it, and do not let the honey cause any harm.
Mays si so trencats les osses del nas am fractura petita o so conminuitz, lahoras cove que scindas sobre aquels, e extraguas aquels am insturmentz que conveno ad aquels; e aprop cos la scissura, e cura aquela am aquo que encarna e consolida, e am emplastres ad aquo convenientz.	If you fracture or break the bones of the nose, you should know that you can cut over those parts, and extract the pieces using instruments suitable for those parts; and close the wound, and cure it with what is appropriate for the nose, which hardens and consolidates, and applies plasters suitable for that.
E si accideys plagua dedintz le nas, lahoras cove que cures aquela am calguas e administra canulas de plom entro que sia de tot sanat.	If you have a swelling in the nose, you should know that you can cure it by compressing it and administering intravenous solutions of plasma as needed to achieve complete recovery.
Capitol .iiii.	Chapter 14.
De restauracio de la mandibula quan es trincada.	Of the restoration of the lower jaw when it is fractured.
Quan la mandibula dejos es rompuda e la fractura de lu no es am plagua, reguarda lahoras si la fractura es deforas tant solament, e no es trencada en dos e es curvada a las partidas dedintz, lahoras la sua cognicio es leugiera.	When the lower jaw is broken and the fracture is not painful, observe if the fracture is deformed only, and not split in two and curved to the sides, then its recognition is easier.
E cove donc, si la fractura es en la part dreyta, que tu intrometas le tieu indic senestre en la boca del malaute; e semblantment si la fractura es an la mandibula senestra, lahoras intromet le dit indic de la ma dreyta; e impelleys am aquel la gilbositat de la fractura dedintz am facilitat a las partidas defora, am la tua autra ma de la partida defora del os; am aquel decentment equa aquelam.	Then, if the fracture is in the left side, introduce the right indicator in the mouth of the patient; and similarly, if the fracture is in the left mandible, introduce the other indicator from the left mandible; and thus, to facilitate the deformity of the dental fracture, use the same bone of the other side of the defect.
E si la fractura de la mandibula ja es separada en doas, lahoras cove que administres extensio de doas partz segon rectitut entro que sia possibla la equacio de lu.	And if the mandible fracture is already separated into halves, observe that you administer extensions of parts on either side according to right angles, as long as it is possible to align them.
E si accideys conmocio de dentz a disrupcio, lahoras strenh aquelas de las quals speras que romandran am fil de aur o de argent o de ceda; e aprop pausa sobre la mandibula trencada cerot, e aprop pausa sobre lu drap duplicat, e pausa sobre le drap gran stelha decentment fayta, o una pessa de sola engual a la longitut de la mandibula; e aprop lia aquela desus segon que a tu es apparelhada la liadura de lu e que conveneys la applicacio, entro que no es destruida.	And if the jaw dislocation occurs with teeth, strengthen those that you think are bent to the gold or silver wire or yield; and pause over the split mandible, and over the drape doubled, and over the great knot of the lower jaw, or a single tooth of the length of the mandible, according to what you have arranged the groove of the teeth and that it is convenient for its application, as long as it is not destroyed.
E comanda al malaute que use de repaus e tranquilitat, e pausa la vianda de lu sorbicios leons.	When ordering the patient to use rest and tranquility, and to stop eating the foods that cause lethargy.
E si extimas que ja es alterada la figura en alcuna manieyra, lahoras tu te coyta e deslia aquel al tertz dia; e aprop rectifica aquo que ja es alterat de lu e emplaustra aquel am polvera de moli, am album de huou, o am farina de cisami, pus que tu auras ostat le cerot de lu, e pausa sobre le emplastra lana leon.	If you suspect that the figure has changed in any way, you should cut and remove it on the third day; and then correct what has changed and apply powder made from sand, alum, or flour, which you had left on the wound, and place a layer of lion's fur over it.
E adonc cum sta annex e ajustat aquel emplastre sobre lu, e la disposicio del os no es alterada, layssa aquel, que no le deslies entro que sia sanat e strenh la fractura; quar motas veguadas aquesta fractura es streyta en tres sempmanas.	And after applying and adjusting the plaster over it, and ensuring that the position of the bone is not altered, leave it, as it will not come out until it is healed and strengthens the fracture; this fracture is strengthened in three weeks with four watched days.
E si autra veguada accida apostema caut, lahoras administra aquo que havem dit motas veguadas en la sedacio de lu entro que sia sanat, e sia remaugut aquel apostema.	If another accidental stroke of lightning occurs, you should administer the medicine that has been given in four watched days when the patient is healed, and keep that stroke of lightning from happening again.
E si la fractura es am plagua, lahoras considera si es pessa del os separada o satagias, lahoras tu te subtilia que ostes aquelas satagias am aquo que conveneys ad aquo en la remocio de aquelas dels sturmentz.	If the fracture is infected, you should consider if it is due to the separated or split bone, and you should carefully observe which of those sutures is appropriate for that in the removal of those from the limbs.
E si le orrifici de la plagua es streyt, lahoras tu le amplifique am le fleubotomi segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat.	If the wound of the plague is straight, then you should enlarge it according to the quantity of your need.
E aprop quan tu auras ostat aquelas satagias, e de aquelas no sira remaugut re, lahoras tu cos le orrifici de la plagua si es ampla; e sino, pausa sobre aquela un dels emplaustres que conveneysso ad aquo e encarnan aquela, entro que sia sanada.	When you have finished cutting those stitches, and if they are not too tight, then use the scissors of the plague if it is large; otherwise, place your hand over one of the fastenings that is suitable for this and covers that, in order to enter if it is healed.
Capitol .v.	Capitol v. means "Chapter V." It is a section
De restauracio de la furcula quan es trinquada.	Of the shoulder restoration when it is dislocated.
Motas veguadas es trencada la furcula de la partida denant deves le muscle, e aquela fractura es fayta en una de tres manieyras.	If the shoulder is twisted, the clavicle is broken at the point where the muscle is located, and this fracture is made in one of three ways.
Quar o es trencada, o seperada, o es seperada en doas partz otra que no accidan satagias; e es leugier a la restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que accideysso en lu satagias, e es dificil a restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que la fractura es am plagua.	If it is broken, it is separated, or it is separated into two parts that do not have sutures, and it is less difficult for the restoration of the shoulder; or it is possible that the fracture occurred in the shoulder, and it is difficult to restore the shoulder; or it is possible that the fracture is ample.
E la operacio en aquela, quan la fractura es ses plagua, es que tu fassas esser present dos ministres, per so que la un tengua le adjutori e siegua la furcula trencada, e l’autre extenda le col ves aquela partida.	And the operation on that is when the fracture is ample, it is that you should have two assistants, so that one holds the assistant and follows the dislocated shoulder, and the other extends the collarbone to that part.
E aprop enguala la fractura am les tieus ditz entro que sia fayta la forma de lu segon que cove, e no sia en lu eminencia pauca ni concavitat.	When the fracture is in the form of a line that goes through the center of the bone and is not prominent or hollow, it is called a transverse fracture by doctors.
E si indigeysses mes de extencio, lahoras cove que pauses dejos le titillic del malaute spera de drap o de lana, e sia la grandesa de lu segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat; e exten e eleva la furcula e coarta la spera am la tua ma entro que enguales la frectura segon que cove.	If you need to extend the area, place a cloth or thread under the thigh, and make it as large as necessary; then extend and lift the collar and cut the cloth along the fracture line that goes through the center of the bone.
E si no podes atirar la extremitat de la furcula a las partidas defora, per so quar es pervenguda al preon, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sua cervitz, e pauses sobre le muscle de lu un coyssi migier en grandeza.	If you cannot pull the end of the collar to the desired position, then make sure that the thigh is relaxed over the pelvis, and place your hand on the muscle of the leg, pressing it with a cushion of greater size.
E le ministre prema le muscle de lu a las partidas dejos entro que l’os de la furcula sia elevat que es en le preon en sus, e lahoras tu rectifique la fractura e enguala aquela am les tieus ditz.	The physician presses the muscle of the leg on the parts that are still exposed, and makes sure that the bone of the collar is elevated as much as possible, and then corrects the fracture and places it according to the lines indicated by the doctor.
Mays si sentes satagias de la furcula e so maugudas, lahoras cove que fendes sobre aquela e extraguas aquelas satagias am facilitat.	If you feel pain in the collar and muscles, place your hand on that area and remove any knots for ease.
E si es retenguda en le os, lahoras tu ingenia inscisio de lu am un dels inscissoris les quals has apparelhatz ad aquo, pus que havias pausat dejos la furcula le sturment que serve le ciphac; e es sturment de fust o de ferr del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	If it is held in the bone, you should make an incision in the flesh of that one of the cuts that you have seen before, because you had paused further down the shoulder where the collarbone serves as the sternum; and this is the form of this:
E es semblant a culier del qual aquesta es la concavitat; e sia la sua latitut segon aquo que has necessitat de lu, segon la grandeza del os o la pauqueza de lu.	It seems like the form of this is that of a butcher's knife; and its length is according to what you need for it, according to the size of the bone or its thickness.
Mays la longitut de lu sia segon que es a tu possible a la operacio; que haja doas extremitatz ayssi cum vezes, e la una extremitat sia ample e l’autre streyta.	The length of it should be according to what you can possibly make it for the operation; that there be ends as far apart as possible, and one end should be wide and the other narrow.
E si la disrupcio de la plagua la qual has inscidida quan has extraytas la satagia del os es ampla, e yest segur de apostema caut, lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura.	And if the disruption of the plague that you have incised when you extracted the marrow from the bone is wide, and it is sure to cause an abscess, then you should adjust the lips of the plague according to the suture.
E si la disrupcio es pauca, o temes apostema caut, lahoras tu uemple la plagua am draps e pulvils segon la quantitat de la scissura de la plagua.	And if the disruption is small, or you fear abscess, then you should fill the plague with cloths and powders according to the amount of the cut in the plague.
E si accideys apostema caut, lahoras infon drap en vi agre e oli rozat e vi, e pausa sobre aquel.	If you encounter anaphylaxis cauterization, inform the patient that it involves cutting through the skin and applying oil, and then stop there.
Mays la strictura del os quan es ses plagua e ses seccio, es que pauses emplastre fayt de farina de moli am album de huou, e pausa sobre lu stopa leon, e aprop pausa la spera dejos le titillic de lu, si indigeyssas de aquela, e aprop pren humemate, so es torca la qual teno les Sarrazis , que sia mot longua, e sia latitut de lu de un palm o entorn aquel; e aprop pausa pulvils duplicatz sobre la stopa e l’emplastre; e aprop pren una stela de taula subtil de la qual la latitut d’ela sia de tres ditz e en longitut semblantment; e aprop envolopa aquela en drap, e aprop envolopa aquel drap am la stela en lo loc sobre le loc de la fractura; e aprop pausa humemati ayssi cum es revout, e revol aquela sobre le col de lu e dejos le titillic de lu sa e dejos le titillic de lu malaute, e reduzeys aquela sobre tota partida, e quan vezes que la strictura de la fractura am strictura descent, e es aquo que no es occultat sobre tu.	If the stricture of the bone is caused by inflammation and separation, it is because you apply flour paste made from albumin of egg whites, and stop over the fracture line, and then reduce the swelling on both sides of the ankle and the knee, and sometimes when the stricture of the fracture is reduced, it is not hidden under your clothes.
E tot, que no sia mauguda la stelha desobre le os trencat; e per so cove que tu vejas le malaute quascun dia, que quan le liament es mollificat o vezas la stela ja esser remauguda, lahoras tu rectifica aquo e strenh la liadura.	And so, do not be concerned if the stone does not cover the fractured bone; and for this reason, you should check the wound every day, if when the limb is softened or the stone has become damaged, you must then correct this and tighten the suture.
E aprop pausa le dormir del malaute sobre le col de lu, e pausa dejos le titillic de lu deves le dormir de lu en la nueyt un petit coyssi; per so que am aquel sia elevat le adjutori de lu del latz de aquel, e donc es elevada la la fractura de la furcula a elevacio del muscle; o sia le bras de lu liat al col de aquel.	And then pause the patient's sleep on his neck, and pause further down his titillis so that he can sleep on his side in the bed with a small pillow; because that is elevated the assistant of his arm from the shoulder of that, and thus the fracture of the shoulder is elevated to the muscle; or if his arm is lying on his collarbone.
E no deslies le liament si no accideys en le loc prusiment o apostema, entro a xii dias.	And do not loosen the ligament if it does not happen in the correct place or hernia, enter within twelve days.
E aprop renovelha le emplastre si has vista la facia de lu ad aquo, e ajusta en la strictura e restaura aquel e layssa entro que sia restaurat e sia coagulat la fractura de la furcula.	And if you have seen the face of the patient and it is swollen, adjust in the stricture and restore that and leave within what is restored and is coagulated the fracture of the shoulder.
E es strenguda e comfortada segon le mes en xxviii dias, e alcunas veguadas en alcus homes es fayt en mens de temps de aquel.	And it is strengthened and comforted every month for 28 days, and some are made in the time of that man.
Capitol .vi.	Chapter VI.
De restauracio de fractura de la spalla.	Of the restoration of shoulder fracture.
Spatula tart es trencada en le loc lat de lu e no so trencatz de lu sino les marges.	A sharp-edged spatula is cut at the location of the shoulder and not cut except for the margins.
E donc quan es trencat le loc de lu — e es trencat en le mieg loc de lu — e no es conogut sino per tocament, lahoras segon que es la figura de la fractura sforsa te la preparacio de lu e reduzir aquela segon la figura natural en tota manieyra de engen la qual es a tu possible.	When you cut the leg of the patient — and it is cut in the middle of the leg — and it is not known otherwise than by touch, then do as follows: first, determine the figure of the fractured bone, then prepare for the reduction of that bone by cutting a second incision, and reduce it back to its natural shape in the entire direction of the bone that is possible.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc polvera de moli am album de huou e stopa leon; e aprop pausa pulvil de drap duplicat; e aprop pausa sobre lu stela lada de taula subtil segon la quantitat de la spatula tota o mays un pauc. Mays si dejos la stela es concavitat en alcu dels locs de la spatula, lahoras tu enguala aquela concavitat am stopa leon, e aprop pueja la stela segon equalitat.	If the stela is now convex in the holes of the spatula's point, then do as follows: cut that convexity with lemon, and perhaps the stela will be equal afterwards.
E aprop strenh desus am humemati longua ab constriccio decent e am fermesa de la stela entro que no sia remauguda del sieu loc.	And then stretch as much as possible the wet long part of the constraint without being tightened by the stela inside that it is not strained of the local location.

E dels accidentz de lu quan es trencat le mieg de lu es que declina a las partidas dedintz e accideys a lu gran dolor, e dificultat en lo hale, e tos, e fort leu e vomeys sanc; e es declarada en lu cavitat en le os trencat e no es occulta al sentiment. De restauracio de la fractura del adjutori.	Of the restoration of the fracture of the arm.

E lahoras usa de stelhas.	When using needles.

For you place the needle over the fracture at that point where there is a pus and it is stronger than the other needles; and place between each of the needles the latitude of the joint, and its longitude according to the trapezoid plus three times the total part.

Mays si tu yest sobre confizanssa que no accida alcuna causa de aquo, lahoras no deslias la liguadura sino aprop tres dias o mays.	If you are over fifty years old and have not experienced any cause of gout, do not delay the application of this remedy for more than three days or more.

Quar de constuma del adjutori e de la camba de lu es que sian strengutz en xl dias; e lahoras cove que sian desliatz e sia administrat banh e sia medicat am enguentz los quals rectifican aquel.	Four common remedies of the pillow and bed are that they should be strengthened for forty days; and you should cover that they are not delayed and are administered in baths and medicines that correct those.
E si la fractura es layha atrita, lahoras tu no deslies de aquela le liament e las stelhas entro a l dias o entro a dos meses.	And if the fracture is an open wound, you should not delay applying the remedy to that limb and the splints for several days or for two months.

De restauracio de fractura del bras.	The translation of "De restauracio de fractura del bras" is "On the restoration of a shoulder
Bras es compost de dos osses les quals so appelatz dos focils; dels quals la un es petit, e es aquel que siec le dit pous, e l’autre es gran e es aquel le qual es pausat dejos le petit dit, de la partida pus dejus.	The translation of "De restauracio de fractura del bras" is "On the restoration of a shoulder"; "Bras es compost de dos osses les quals so appelatz dos focils" means "Shoulder is composed of two bones which are called collarbones"; "dels quals la un es petit, e es aquel que siec le dit pous, e l’autre es gran e es aquel le qual es pausat dejo le petit dit, de la partida pus dejus" means "one is small, and the other is the one that pushes out the small one, and the other is large and the one that holds the
E fort leu es trencat le focil major solament, o le petit, e fort leu son trincatz ensemps.	E fort leu es trencat le focil major solamente, o le petit, e fort leu son trincatz ensemp." means "And the larger collarbone is often cut only, or the small one, and both are often broken into pieces.

E quan es trencat le focil petit desus, lahoras la restauracio de lu es leugiera, e la sanacio de lu es pus leugiera." means "And when the smaller collarbone is cut, the restoration of it requires careful work, and the care of it requires careful work.

E quan es trencut le focil de lu dejo la fractura de lu es mal, e la sanacio de lu es dificil." means "And when the larger collarbone is cut, the restoration of it is often bad, and the care of it is difficult.
E pus mala de aquela es quan son trencatz dos osses essemps.	When the bones of that part are broken, it is called a fracture.
Donc si l’os le qual es trencat es le focil petit desus, lahoras es convenient al metge, deves la restauracio de lu, que pauze petita extencio am facilitat entro que aquel sia engualhat.	If the small bone that is broken is the little toe, it is convenient for the surgeon to intervene, and you must restore the position of the toe, which can be easily done by gently pulling it back.
Mays si le focil gran es aquo que es trincat, lahoras cove que pause extencio pus vehement.	If the large bone is broken, you must pull it out as far as possible.
E si les dos focils so ensemps trincatz, lahoras cove que tu pauses la extritura mot pus fort.	If both bones are broken, you must pull them out as hard as possible.
E cove que pauses la figura de la ma deves la restauracio de lu e la extencio de lu estenduda sobre un coyssi, e sia le pols de la ma a las partidas desus, pus aut que totz les autres ditz, e le dit auricular sia pus bas dels autres ditz, e le malaute sia cezent sobre una cezela cayrada.	And if you pull the figure of the woman out, you must restore the position of the leg and extend it over a cushion, and place the fingers of the hand in the parts that are mentioned above, and then all other words should be placed below them, and the body should be placed on a cushion that is tilted at an angle.
E sia un coyssi denant lu en la altetut o endreyt de lu, per so que·l malaute no encorra trebalh.	And if the cushion is placed under the foot or ankle of the leg, so that the body does not collapse.
E aprop le ministre extenda le bras de la partida pus dejos am la sieua ma o am liament, e autre ministre extenda desus semblantment.	And if the doctor extends the arm of the part that is pulled out towards the shoulder or elbow, and another doctor extends it in a similar manner.
E aprop le metge engualhe le os entro que redugua aquel segon la milhor figura que pot.	When the physician examines the joint and finds that it is swollen, they should choose the best figure that can be.
E si en la factura del os so satagias, lahoras te perforsa raduzir tota pessa en le sieu loc am la tua vertut.	If in the measurement of the bone there are any deficiencies, then you should drill holes completely in that place according to your virtue.
E si appar en lu satagia separada que punh la codena e no es a tu speransa en la restauracio de lu, lahoras tu fen sobre lu e osta aquela segon la manieyra la qual havem dita desus.	If in that separate part of the bone there is a broken codon and you do not see your hope for its restoration, then you should cut off that part and take another one as described by those who have told you.
Mays si la fractura es am plagua, yeu ja he fayt ad aquo capitol singular, e donc pren la curacio de aquel.	If the fracture is in the hip, and I have already made this capital single case, then take the care of that one.
E si accideys apostema caut al comensament de la tua restauracio, lahoras tu lineys un drap am cerot fayt de oli rozat e cera blanca, e sia migier entre specitut e subtilitat, e strenh drap sobre aquel am strictura subtil entro que le apostema sia cedat; e lahoras remau le cerot e pausa emplastre preparat de polvera de moli am clayre de huou, e aprop pausa stelhas; e sia la stela la qual es pauzada sobre aquela fractura pus lada e pus fort.	If you encounter a fissure at the beginning of your restoration, then line up one cloth as follows: a red olive and white wax, and it should be between precision and subtlety, and press the cloth over that subtle fissure when the fissure is ready to be closed; then remove the cloth and pause the prepared powder of clay, and place the stela as follows: the stela that was paused on the fractured part with a little force.
E sapias que·l nombre de las stelas del bras so vi en las majors disposicios, o sia la fractura en un focil o en dos focils ensemps.	You know that the number of stars in the arm you saw was in the major positions, or if it is a fracture in one bone or in two bones.
E aprop pausa la tua strictura sobre le loc de la fractura pus fort e pus vehement, e quan mays sira la extrictura a las partidas desus de la fractura o a las partidas pus bassas de lu, pausa la strictura un pauc pus molh segon que es precedida la rememoracio de lu en le comensament del capitol.	And then stop the traction on the site of the fracture with great and violent force, and when less than the extirction of the parts from the fracture or the parts at its bases, stop the traction as soon as possible after the rememoration of the patient at the beginning of the crown.
E les draps que so envolopatz sobre la fractura sian draps mols humitz, e no sian durs ni aspres, e·l fiel am le qual es strenhut sia de li propriament migier entre subtil e gros, ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And the plasters that envelop the fracture are very humid, not hard or rough, and the one that fits best is the one that is most suitable for the specifically subtle and coarse, as has been recommended.
E considera le membre e·l liament aprop alcus dias.	Consider the member and the limb at the appropriate time.
E si accideys alcuna causa de la qual rectificacio es necessaria, ayssi cum prusiment le qual accideys al membre, e lahoras cove que tu enbroques le membre am aygua cauda entro que cesse aquel pruziment.	And if you happen to encounter any cause for which rectification is necessary, please act as soon as possible with that member, and cover the member with wet cloth until that disturbance ceases.
E leysses le membre no costreyt entro que repause, e aprop torna la strictura.	And the member should not be tightened when it rests, and then return the traction.
E si la extrictura ja es mollificada e l’os ja es remaugut e semblantz ad aquels, lahoras rectifiqua tot aquo am la tua vertut.	If the extriction has already been softened and the bone has been re-growing and appears similar to those, then you should correct everything with your own virtue.
E considera mays si le nutriment es prohibit pervenir al membre per superfluitat de strictura, quar lahoras cove que mollifiques aquel un petit e laysses aquel per alcus dias entro que corra ad aquel le nutriment, e aprop strenh aquel.	Consider whether the nutrient can reach the member due to superfluity of stricture, for which they cover that softens it a little and makes it less tight over several days as it runs into that nutrient, and apply that.
Mays si al malaute no accideys alcuna causa de aquelas que havem ditas, lahoras no cove que sia desliat entro aprop xx dias o enviro de aquels.	If there is no cause for those that have been said to happen at the thighs, they do not cover that it has been slid within twenty days or outside of them.

De restauracio de fractura de la pinche de la ma e dels ditz.	Of the restoration of fracture of the thumb of the thigh and of the fingers.
Sapias que a la pinche de la ma e als nuzes dels ditz tart endeve fractura, e no accideys a lor sino atricio motas veguadas.	Do you know that the thumb of the thigh and the fingers are fractured, and they do not happen to them but by violent movements seen.
E quan accideys a la ma fractura o atrissio, lahoras cove que·l malaute segua cayrat e denant lu lies cezent segon equalitat, e aprop pausa la ma de lu sobre aquela extenduda.	When one experiences a fracture or dislocation of the leg, it is necessary to cover the thigh with a cloth and secure it with a bandage, then pause the leg at that point and extend it as much as possible.
E aprop le ministre extenda les osses trencatz e·l metge engualhe aquels entro que sian congongitz am bona congoncio.	Then the master extends the shattered bones and places the foot on them, pressing down until they are in good contact.
E lahoras cove que pause emplastre e estopa, si no accideys apostema caut; e aprop pausa stela desus segon la quantitat del loc, e tu ja has envolopada aquela en drap de li.	Then cover the area with plaster and stop, unless one experiences pain afterward; then pause at that point according to the size of the wound, and you have already wrapped it in cloth.
Mays si la trincadura es en las partidas dedintz deves le ventre de la palma, e lahoras fay semblant de spera de drap, e comanda al malaute que strenha aquela am la sua palma trincada; aprop sia strenguda am drap lonc.	If the sprain is in the thumbs of the fingers, and cover it with cloth, making it seem like a support for the hand, commanding the foot to tighten around that as if it were a spring; then make it long enough to cover the thumb.
E sia la stelha de cuer am drap en le qual sia levitat, per so que le cuer sia aplicat a la palma; e strenh aquela segon que cove.	And if the cloth is long enough to cover the thumb, as if the hand were applied to the finger; then tighten it around that point.
Mays si la fractura es a las partidas defora, lahoras cove que pauses desus stela e autre estela de la partida dejos en la palma, per so que la ma sia uberta e dreyta; e aprop pausa la strictura, ayssi cum es revolvuda la ma a la rateta entre les ditz am liamentz.	If the fracture is at the ends of the fingers, cover it with cloth and place another piece of cloth under the end of the finger, so that the hand is straight and tense; then pause the tightening, as if it were rolled around the ring between the fingers.
E si accideys fractura a alcu dels nozes dels ditz, lahoras si es le dit pous, sia engualat segon que cove e aprop sia strenhut am la palma e si·t voles, pausa a lu astela petita dreyta per so que sia elevada la fractura e no sia mauguda.	If a fracture occurs in any of the bones of the fingers, then if it is the little finger, cut it off immediately and cover it with a cloth, and apply pressure to the palm with your hand, and place a piece of cloth on top to prevent further injury and keep it clean.
Mays si la fractura es en les autres ditz, ayssi cum en aquel del mieg loc, o en le indic, o en le auricular, o en le anular, lahoras sia engualhat e liat am le dit sa le qual siec aquel; o sian totz liatz segon continuacio, e es milhor; o pausa sobre aquel stela petita, ayssi cum havem dit en le pous.	If the fracture is in any other finger, cut it off in the same way as in that one, or in the index, or in the earlobe, or in the anus; or all of them are cut at once, which is better; or place your hand on that small piece of cloth, as they have said in the pus.
E considera, en la tua restauracio, e aprop aquela, la disposicio de apostema caut e oppose — am la tieua operacio — am aquo que cove quan accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, segon que es iterada la narracio de lu.	And consider, in your restoration, and above all, the disposition of the stitching and opposing — as in the second operation — I say that it covers when any cause occurs, according to the narrative of the case.
Capitol .xiv.	Chapter 14.
De restauracio de fractura del os de la coyssa.	Of restoring a bone fracture of the thigh.
Le os de la cueyssa motas veguadas es trencat e es declarat al sentiment segon que es convertit a la partida denant e a la pus sobirana.	The bones of the thigh that are cut open are divided and declared to the patient according to what is converted into the part where the pus is located.
E la restauracio de lu se fa enayssi que·l liament es strenhut sobre la fractura e autre liament dejos la fractura, e le malaute sia prostrat sobre le sieu ventre e sobre la cara.	The restoration of the patient's condition is done in such a way that one bandage is placed over the fracture and another bandage further down the fracture, and the abdomen is laid prostrate on the side belly and face.
E aprop le ministre extenda tot le liament a la sua partida segon la qualitat, quan la fractura es en le mieg loc del os.	And the surgeon extends the bandage to its full length according to the quality of the bone in the location of the fracture.
Mays si es propdana a la razitz de la cueyssa, lahoras sia le liament propda al denolh a la partida del pentenilh, per so que la extencio caja en sus, e le autre liament dejos la fractura.	If it is necessary to tighten the bandage at the knee, then place the bandage tightly at the top of the thigh, so that the extension catches in the femur, and the other bandage further down the fracture.
E semblantment si la trencadura es propdana al denolh, lahoras sia fayt le liament propda al denol, e sia la extencio a las partidas dejos.	And if the taping is tight at the knee, then place the bandage tightly at the top of the thigh, and have the extension at the parts further down.
E aprop le metge enguale le os am amduas las sieuas mas entro que reduzesca aquel segon la semblansa natural e l’os es conjungit per bona conjunccio; lahoras cove que pauses emplastre e strictura, si no accideys al membre apostema.	And the surgeon aligns the bones as much as possible within the joints, reducing the second natural and the bone is united by good union; you cover that places plaster and stricture, if not causes to the member apothesis.
Mays si accideys en lu apostema, lahoras tu layssa aquel per alcus dias entro que l’apostema caut sia cedat, e aprop retorna a la tua curacio.	If you injure the apothesis, then you must remove it within a few days after the apothesis has started to separate, and return to your care.
La strictura de lu sia ayssi fayta: cove que envolopes sobre la fractura una benda dura, e dobla aquela dos o tres veguadas, e remaugua de lu superfluitat; e aprop envolopa la camba entro que pervengua al talo e a la razitz de la cueyssa.	When the stricture of the patient's joint is: cover that covers over the fracture with a hard needle, bend it into two or three loops, and remain in the superfluity; and cover that enters the talo and the tip of the thigh.
E intromet lonc fiel entre la cueyssa e la camba prop del denol a las partidas dejos, e venguan las extremitatz del fiel de la partida pus sobirana de las doas partz, e aprop revolveys sobre la camba e la cueyssa aquo que superflueys de la benda.	Insert a long thread between the thigh and the joint of the denol, and let the ends of the thread come out at the opposite sides, and wrap them around the joint and the thigh as much as possible that is superfluous from the needle.
E aprop pausa sobre la cueyssa en le loc de aquela fractura astelhas, e pausa de aquelas una stela sobre le os de la camba.	And place your hand over the thigh in the location of that astelhas fracture, and place one stone on the bones of the joint.
E aprop uempli las vacuitatz entre la camba e la cuoyssa am draps mols, per so que sia coagulada la extrictura.	And fill the spaces between the joint and the thigh with cloths, so that the stricture is coagulated.
E aprop comensa am strictura fort del mieg sobre le loc de la fractura am tres envolucios o quatre, e quant mays tu te alonhas am liament del loc de la fractura, la tua strictura sia menor e pus leugiera e pus molha.	And begin the stricture as hard as possible over the location of the fracture with three or four envelops, and when you have fewer liaments from the location of the fracture, your stricture will be smaller and hold more and less.
E aprop exten a doas extremitatz del fiel a las partidas dejos entro que pervengua a la cavilha del pe, e strenh amdoas las extremitatz de las stelhas del autra part per so que·l liament no sia remaugut del sieu loc.	And extend the ends of the umbilical cord to the parts where it passes through the foot's cavity, and firmly hold the ends of the other strings of the belly per se that the umbilicoid not be torn from its place.
E aprop leyssa la strectura sobre aquel, don esta ayssi que no accideys al membre corrosio ni apostema caut ni emflacio e semblantz ad aquels; e si accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, adonc cueta te am desliament de lu, e rectifica aquo que accideys tot aprop, segon que havem dit motas veguadas.	And apply the strain over that, so that it does not happen to the corroding or post-mortem member, nor to the cauda nor to the inflammation, and if it happens to any cause of those, then cut me a piece of that, and correct what happens totally, according to what has been said by the watchers.
Mays si en le os es pessa del os la qual pongua, lahoras cove que tu engualhes aquel segon que a tu es possibla; e sino, fen sobre lu e remau aquel, e cura am aquo del qual es precedida la rememoracio entro que sia sanat.	If in the bone there is pain from the bone that is placed, then cover that second with what is possible for you; otherwise, fence it around and remove that, and cure that which precedes the remembrance within which it is cured.
E alcunas veguadas es strenhuda aquesta fractura de la coyssa otra aquo que sian ajustadas a lu stelhas, ayssi cum havem dit en le adjutori e·n le bras.	And if some watchers firmly hold this fracture of the thigh or another that is adjusted to the other strings, then as has been said in the helper and in the arm.
Mays empero en la restauracio de lu en tal manieyra fayta no accideys al malaute claudicacio; e si es restaurada sola, otra aquo que li sia applicada l’autra camba, lahoras es necessari que claudique aquel del qual es tostemps.	However, in the restoration of that, it does not happen to the thigh claudication; and if it is restored alone, or another one that is applied to the other string, then you need to walk that of which you have been tempted to walk.
E sapias que la coyssa es strenhuda en xl dias o un pauc mes o un pauc mens, e tot aquo es segon la diversitat de las compleccios e de las autras dispozicios. Capitol .xv.	Capitulum XV.
De restauracio de la fractura de la rodela del denolh.	When it comes to the restoration of the fracture of the collarbone,
Sapias que fractura de la rodela del denol tart endeve, mays accideys a lu motas veguadas atrissio.	You know that a collarbone fracture can occur due to violent impact or fall.
Mays si accideys a lu fractura, lahoras no es sino fissura o trauc en las suas partidas, e aquo es am plagua o ses plagua, e sobre aquo tot es estat am le sentiment.	If the fracture occurs, it is not just a crack or split in the bones, and that causes pain or discomfort, and everything is affected by that feeling.
E la restauracio de lu es enayssi que sia engualat aquo que es romput de las partidas de lu am les ditz entro que sia agreguat e conjongit segon que es possible per equacio e facilitat e fabricacio.	And the restoration of the fracture is such that it seems to be held together as if it were broken, but it is actually fixed and reinforced according to what can be achieved with equality and ease and convenience and production.
